Text: Kendal:  Historically in Westmorland, it is situated about 8 mi south-east of Windermere, 19 mi north of Lancaster, 23 mi north-east of Barrow-in-Furness and 38 mi north-west of Skipton.
Triplets:<Kendal
2:
--------------------
Text: Kendal:  The town lies in the valley or "dale" of the River Kent, from which it derives its name, and has a total resident population of 28,586, making it the third largest settlement in Cumbria behind Carlisle and Barrow-in-Furness.
Triplets:<Kendal
